<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82032</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82032</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4637</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Directed number strips (-15 to +15)</string>
            <string language="es">Tiras de números negativos y positivos (-15 a +15)</string>
            <string language="ga">Striocaí Uimhreacha Dírithe (-15 go +15)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwiesene Zahlstreifen (-15 bis +15)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bandes dirigées de nombre (-15 à +15)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tiras dirigidas do número (-15 a +15)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strisce dirette di numero (-15 - +15)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατευθυνόμενες λουρίδες αριθμού (-15 + 15)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Printable number strips (-15 to +15) which can be cut out and used by pupils in problems which involve directed numbers.</string>
            <string language="es">Tiras de números que se pueden imprimir (-15 hasta +15), se pueden cortar para que los alumnos las utilicen en problemas relacionados con números positivos y negativos.</string>
            <string language="ga">Striocaí Uimhreacha ar féidir a phriontáil (-15 go +15) le gearradh amach agus le húsáid ag daltaí i bhfadhbanna le huimhreacha dírithe.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Maths</string>
            <string language="es">Matemáticas</string>
            <string language="ga">Mata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Algebra</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Ailgéabar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bedruckbare Zahl entfernt (-15 bis +15) die 
ausgeschnitten werden und durch Pupillen in den Problemen verwendet 
werden kann, die verwiesene Zahlen miteinbeziehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bandes imprimables de nombre (-15 à +15) qui 
peuvent être coupées et employées par des pupilles dans les 
problèmes qui impliquent des nombres dirigés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tiras printable do número (-15 a +15) que podem 
ser cortadas e usado pelas pupilas nos problemas que envolvem números
dirigidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strisce stampabili di numero (-15 - +15) che 
possono essere tagliate ed usate dalle pupille nei problemi che 
coinvolgono i numeri diretti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκτυπώσιμες λουρίδες αριθμού (-15 + σε 15) που 
μπορούν να αποκοπούν και να χρησιμοποιηθούν από τους μαθητές στα 
προβλήματα που περιλαμβάνουν τους κατευθυνόμενους αριθμούς.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Algebra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Algèbre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource Supplémentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Álgebra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso Adicional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per la matematica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Algebra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa Supplementare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλγεβρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
